DOC.brief_summary: In order learn follicular lymphoma anti-cancer vaccine , collect sample people diagnosis . We hope make vaccine tissue help immune system destroy cancer cell . We plan keep sample tissue bank indefinitely .
DOC.brief_title: Procurement Follicular B Cell Lymphoma Cells Purpose Possible Use Future Clinical Trials
DOC.detailed_description: - The following test procedure perform : Approximately 50cc peripheral blood drawn store tissue bank ; patient follicular lymphoma cell circulate blood 40cc 's blood drawn store processing ; patient undergo lymph node biopsy sample biopsy store ; patient fluid drained abdomen around lung fluid save cell collection processing ; patient undergo bone marrow biopsy sample store cell collection processing .
DOC.criteria: Relapsed , refractory de novo histologically confirm follicular Bcell lymphoma accessible lymph node , tumor mass malignant effusion peripheral blood 35 year age old Uncontrolled active infection HIV viral Hepatitis infection Other current malignancy except situ cancer basal squamous cell carcinoma skin Autoimmune cytopenia
